title: FYP #30 The Importance of Vulnerability
description:
Here is a bonus teaching on the importance of vulnerability. Plus. Chloe takes over with this week’s 3-2-1. 3 questions to ask, 2 verses to dig deeper, and 1 challenge for the weekend.

Download the book club guide PDF here: jennieallen.com

Get your copy of Find Your People: findyourpeoplebook.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267
